Pre-Game Insights: Didier Deschamps believes that a month-long competition is long enough for a team to evolve.
The French team is hoping to bounce back against Belgium after a poor start in Euro 2024.
France's opportunity could arrive in their match against Belgium, a team which also failed to live up to its seeded status.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Belgium finished second in its group (behind Romania), with a mixed record (one win, one draw and one defeat), and its goal tally was no greater than that of the French (two goals scored).
The Belgians even had a falling-out with their fans, who whistled at them after a third match that was considered timid (0-0 against Ukraine).
Others: The French team's experience and the five days without playing since the last match against Poland will be crucial in correcting the limitations that have appeared in the group stage.
Belgium, of course, is dreaming of erasing the traumatic defeat at the 2018 World Cup, considered to be an injustice.
